fieldUpdates.name: Update Actual Cost

rules.fullName: inspire1__New Project Task Notification for Contacts
rules.description: Sends contact an email notification when assigned a new project task.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(inspire1__Inspire_Task__c)), inspire1__sysContactTaskEmail__c = TRUE, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Completed')), NOT(ISNULL(WhoId)), inspire1__Inspire_Task__r.inspire1__Project__r.inspire1__Send_Task_Notification__c = TRUE )

rules.description: Populates Actual Cost fields on Task.
rules.formula: AND( (OR( ISCHANGED( inspire1__Planned_Effort__c ), ISCHANGED( inspire1__Hourly_Rate__c ), ISCHANGED( inspire1__Actual_Effort__c )) ), $Setup.inspire1__InspirePlannerConfig__c.inspire1__Use_Effort_to_Calculate_Cost__c = TRUE, OR( NOT(ISBLANK( inspire1__Inspire_Task__c )), TEXT(inspire1__Schedule_As__c) != "" ) )
